explains: n. 商讨，磋商，磋商会议；咨询，就诊；查找，查阅
wordGroup: in consultation with 经与…磋商

sentences.en: David gives the first consultation gratis.
sentences.cn: 戴维免费提供第一次咨询。

sentences.en: The decision was taken after close consultation with local residents.
sentences.cn: 这项决定是在与当地居民仔细磋商后作出的。

sentences.en: A personal diet plan is devised after a consultation with a nutritionist.
sentences.cn: 经向营养师作咨询后，一份个人饮食方案设计出来了。
